casebody.data:
Frederick McLewee, respondent, v. Cassius H. Read, et al., appellants. Decided March 30, 1885. Appeal by defendants from judgment for plaintiff entered upon a verdict of a jury. Christopher Fine, for appellants. James 0. Foley, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and O’Gorman, J.

Opinion by Sedgwick, Ch. J.

Judgment and order

affirmed, with costs.
